skills.name: Install Redis Client
skills.pattern: npm install redis

skills.name: Install ioredis
skills.pattern: npm install ioredis

skills.name: Connect
ioredis Connect
skills.pattern:
import Redis from 'ioredis';
const redis = new Redis({ host: 'localhost', port: 6379 });

skills.name: SET/GET
skills.pattern:
await client.set('key', 'value');
const value = await client.get('key');

skills.name: SETEX
skills.pattern: await client.setEx('session', 3600, JSON.stringify(sessionData)); // 1 hour TTL

skills.name: INCR/DECR
MSET/MGET
skills.pattern:
await client.mSet({ key1: 'val1', key2: 'val2' });
const values = await client.mGet(['key1', 'key2']);

skills.name: HSET/HGET
HINCRBY
skills.pattern: await client.hIncrBy('user:1', 'visits', 1);

skills.name: LPUSH/RPUSH
skills.pattern:
await client.lPush('queue', 'item1');
await client.rPush('queue', 'item2');

skills.name: LPOP/RPOP
skills.pattern:
const item = await client.lPop('queue');
const item = await client.rPop('queue');

skills.name: LRANGE
skills.pattern:
const items = await client.lRange('queue', 0, -1); // all items
const first10 = await client.lRange('queue', 0, 9);

skills.name: SADD/SMEMBERS
Set Operations
ZADD/ZRANGE
skills.pattern:
await client.zAdd('leaderboard', [{ score: 100, value: 'player1' }, { score: 200, value: 'player2' }]);
const top10 = await client.zRange('leaderboard', 0, 9, { REV: true });

skills.name: ZINCRBY
skills.pattern: await client.zIncrBy('leaderboard', 10, 'player1');

skills.name: EXPIRE/TTL
Key Operations
PUBLISH
skills.pattern: await client.publish('channel', JSON.stringify({ event: 'update', data: {} }));

skills.name: SUBSCRIBE
MULTI/EXEC
Lua Scripts
skills.pattern:
const script = `return redis.call('get', KEYS[1])`;
const result = await client.eval(script, { keys: ['mykey'] });

skills.name: Pipeline
Streams
skills.pattern:
await client.xAdd('stream', '*', { field: 'value' });
const messages = await client.xRead({ key: 'stream', id: '0' });

skills.name: RedisJSON
skills.pattern:
await client.json.set('user:1', '$', { name: 'John', age: 30 });
const user = await client.json.get('user:1');

skills.name: RediSearch
skills.pattern:
await client.ft.create('idx', { '$.name': { type: SchemaFieldTypes.TEXT } }, { ON: 'JSON' });
const results = await client.ft.search('idx', 'John');

skills.name: Cache Pattern
Session Store
skills.pattern:
const RedisStore = require('connect-redis').default;
app.use(session({ store: new RedisStore({ client }), secret: 'key' }));

skills.name: Cluster
skills.pattern: const cluster = new Redis.Cluster([{ host: 'node1', port: 6379 }, { host: 'node2', port: 6379 }]);
